Category:Star Wars: Build Your Own R2-D2

nodes.text: Building the Galaxy is a department within the Star Wars: Build Your Own R2-D2 magazine published by De Agostini. Each issue contains the department, which covers details on the creation of the Star Wars universe.

This fascinating section lets you look behind the scenes to see the techniques used to construct and film the droids, ships, sets and creatures of all the Star Wars movies. Explore their development from the earliest concept to the final stunning prop models, photographed in minute detail.
